nodes.text: Pritarr were feline creatures native to the jungles of the planet Onderon.

Pritarr communicated over long distances using low-frequency sounds, such as an infrasonic "purr", in their search for prey. Their sensitivity to these sounds allowed them to detect seismic activity long before it happened, which the Untamed used to their advantage by preparing for disaster if their pritarr were restless.
Pritarr appear in the 2019's sixth expansion to the videogame Star Wars: The Old Republic, called Onslaught.
